alert.note: Alert for Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 9:17PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF LYCOMING AND SULLIVAN COUNTIES... HAZARDS...Heavy snow showers accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...Multiple heavy snow showers were located over Northern Lycoming and Sullivan counties, moving southeast at 40 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Laporte, Waterville, Lairdsville, Ralston, Cedar Run, Unityville, Cammal, Trout Run, Barbours, Shunk, Little Pine State Park, Cogan Station, Ricketts Glen State Park, Slate Run, English Center, Muncy Valley and Buttonwood. * This includes the following highways... Route 15 from Oak Lynn to north of Buttonwood. Route 220 from Picture Rocks to near Dushore. State Road 14 from Trout Run to near Ralston. State Road 118 from Lairdsville to Biggertown. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
